dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3044 : To approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.

section.header: Transfer of Yellow Creek Port Properties
section.text: In accordance with section 4(k) of the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 (16 U.S.C. 831c(k)), Congress approves the conveyance by the Tennessee Valley Authority, on behalf of the United States, to the State of Mississippi of the Yellow Creek Port properties owned by the United States and in the custody of the Authority at Iuka, Mississippi, as of the date of enactment of this Act.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 15, 2014.
